decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (2016/BR/01 - Proposed Location Plan; 2016/BR/01 - Existing Ground Floor Plan; 2016/BR/02; 2016/BR/03; 2016/BR/06; 2016/BR/07; 2016/BR/15; 2016/BR/17 Rev: D; 2016/BR/18 Rev: C; 2016/BR/21 Rev: D; Unnumbered Heritage, Design and Access Statement; Unnumbered Planning Statement. Received: 12/06/2017.
Unnumbered Flood Risk Matrix. Received: 14/06/2017.
2016/BR/11 Rev: G; 2016/BR/12 Rev: G; 2016/BR/13 Rev: E; 2016/BR/14 Rev: G; 2016/BR/16 Rev: F. Received: 04/12/2017. 
2016/BR/22. Received: 15/12/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - This consent does not permit the demolition or dismantling of any part of the building, or the removal of any internal/external feature, floor, wall or ceiling surface, except in so far as the alterations hereby approved necessitate the removal of certain parts of the existing structure as specifically shown on the approved drawings.

Condition : 4 - No development shall take place until samples of the existing and proposed materials of the works hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 5 - No development shall take place until 1:20 scale drawings of all new joinery of the hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.
description: Erection of a single storey rear infill extension, alterations to existing rear extension incorporating new roof and fenestration and internal alterations including listed building consent under reference P/2017/2515
